body:
Hi Xiaojian, From my understanding, there is no difference between two ways of setting air wall as you described. 
What surface value do you want to get? if you want to check surface temperature, you have to set "energyPlus output" correctly (please see following screenshot), and use "read energyPlus surface result" to get results. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/YOoFu1FozwEL4nwnryYeJZr6anwciOqFMv1qzLqWoJHdgmYLpSm-yPKU1bstaq1lRks3SJk7-kvWeAZZLJWZeF2WmZh8XGA4/Capture.PNG) Hope is helps. -Mingbo
